website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality option for seasoned juicers who know what they're getting into with a masticating juicer.
pros: While this style of juicer takes slightly longer, the juice it produces is well worth the wait
This model works well with hard, difficult to juice fruits and vegetables
The pulp is left drier than with any other models and there is no need to run it through again
The juicer feels sturdy and the motor is powerful
Clean up is also easy and all the pieces are dishwasher safe
cons: The juicer is quite powerful, and therefore gets very loud

website_summaries.verdict: This is a basic but sturdy, juicer at an affordable price.
pros: This Hamilton Beach model is as easy to use and clean and as effective at juice extraction as some of its much pricier counterparts
cons: This juicer is louder than others and has a large footprint, taking up valuable counter space
It lacks the extra bells and whistles of pricier models

customer_reviews.title: The auger is out of order after a couple of uses!
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind slow mastication and all that is perfect. But issue is, the auger that fits into the chute, has lost its function of fruit pulp-propulsion through its rotatory motion... The machine (motor part) itself is working fine and other parts are ok. But the fruit pulp and juice just starts churning in the chute and the juice never dribbles down although the juice opening is just down there on the bottom. So is the pulp that never makes its way out of the pulp opening. Hopefully I get a solution on this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Apocalypto_Altapete

customer_reviews.title: Short life and poor customer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this juicer on February 25. I was very happy with it until it simply stopped working last night. Tried contacting the online support only to be constantly receive a message of unavailability. This should be advertised as a disposable juicer!.... still awaiting feedback. Sigh
customer_reviews.author: Laurane Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing because of how much juice it gets out. I squeeze the pulp at the end and never get more than a few drips. Also this company has a great warranty, had an Aicok before but theirs was sketchy with only a 90 day full warranty. Seems sturdy, I use beets and carrots all the time and this thing really takes them well. 4 stars because this thing can get LOUD and the sounds it makes while grinding are crazy but still works well and well built!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan McMinn

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach is the best value!
customer_reviews.text: I make fresh celery juice every morning with this juicer. It is easy to use, easy to clean, and looks nice on my kitchen counter. Celery juice has changed my life and Hamilton Beach is my go-to place to buy kitchen equipment because they always have a better price. I bought a second one of these juicers for my mom so when I go visit her, I can make myself fresh celery juice. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wheatgrass!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only use it for spinach and wheatgrass and is amazing! I have Breville juicer which is the best juicer in the industry, but it's not a masticating juicer so I'm having both for their specific job.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I made in 2018! So easy to clean, quiet, nice attachments! It doesn’t get any better for the $
customer_reviews.author: jaelynandkylee

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product
customer_reviews.text: This product has everything I could want in a juicer. It is quiet, sturdy, easy to use and clean, so I have been using it often over the past few months since I bought it. Plus, because of its style and its powerful engine, it is very quiet, not at all like my old juicer. I wholeheartedly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It can be a bugger to take apart and put together. It is hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I had ordered an off brand that was a piece of junk and am so happy to have this one. It is super easy to claen and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan J

customer_reviews.title: I was apprehensive about juicers but this one won my heart
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and dissassemble, easy to clean, very quite, very fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cabra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used it every day to juice celery and carrots, for the past 2 months, and it's done a great job.
customer_reviews.author: DSH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife and she loves it. She uses it every morning. Happy wife happy life
customer_reviews.author: Big Wave

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I love it this product, easy to use and not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Sara colon

customer_reviews.title: I received one that doesnt work.
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today but It doesn't work, also couldn't be replaced because there was no more in stock. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Very simple & easy
customer_reviews.text: I found a lot of juicers to be so high maintenance. This is by far the easiest to assemble & clean & is perfect for my every day use. Not to industrial & I love its not too big & I can keep on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Masticating juicers
customer_reviews.text: This is the one of the best masticating juicers! It’s so easy to use and clean! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: brevillelover

customer_reviews.title: incredibly easy to clean up!
customer_reviews.text: am very pleased with this juicer. It is INCREDIBLY easy to use AND to clean
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. Very good price compare to other slow juicers. Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: like it very quiet and juices very smooth easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: eagershopper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS JUICER
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been juicing for about a month and this juicer is amazing, so easy to use and clean! I would definitely purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: ryan whelchel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to start juicing
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine for the light duty i am using it for right now. I can see myself out growing it but it is doing the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Jaworski

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The centrifugational one made by HB is better. This one needs improvement. Its a waste of veggie
customer_reviews.author: FJSS

customer_reviews.title: it does provide a lot of juice, I've been ...
customer_reviews.text: it does provide a lot of juice, I've been using now about 6 weeks. Has been making an odd sound recently, but still performing.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Just a Bad Product....
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first juicer. I am doing the Gerson Therapy and they suggest not using my old juicer so I bought this one instead. Big Mistake. The juicer works okay for the first couple of minutes, then stops up. The reverse does not help. In order to get one 8 oz glass of juice, you have to disassemble it at least once and clean out. It's very wasteful. It's very time consuming. If you are looking for a great juicer, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Time wasted
customer_reviews.text: If you have hours each day to juice, this is the juicer for you! It takes me 1.5-2 hours to make 5 small juices because I constantly have to disassemble, clean, reassemble, juice. Repeat. It doesn't matter what fruit or veggie I use & this does not include time to prep the foods for juicing. This is simply juicing time. I don't know about you, but taking that much time out to juice is just too much.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: It works with carrots with no problem.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this juicer ONLY to make carrot juice. I searched awhile to know about pros and cons of many products. I finally settled on this one with price in lower side but with good reviews for making juice from hard ingredients. And I'm happy. This is a great juicer. I have made a lot of carrot juice AND I don't see any part that may break in near future. The only problem have is... it seems to produce a little juice out of lots of carrots. This is the only juicer I've evern owned so I have nothing to compare with. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sooyoung Chung

customer_reviews.title: Pulp was not as dry as I wanted it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Pulp was not as dry as I wanted it to be. I ran it through 2 to 3 times depending on the vegetable. Simple to work. Quiet, not as noisy as the other juicer i have. Price was cheaper than I found on other cites
customer_reviews.author: king

customer_reviews.title: ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: we did not think it did as well as the traditional juicers and it was slower and produced a lot of foam which our other juicer did not so we sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Katena W.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Design
customer_reviews.text: I used it 3 times. Everything I used clogged it up. I ended up sending it back for a refund. Horrible design.
customer_reviews.author: UpDownAllAround

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for what I need. It works well for most vegetables and fruits. I did noticed that the bigger end of carrots have a hard time going through. Just need to split the big end first. Overall I’m happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: cobracar84

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Fruit gets stuck very fast can’t really do anything with it after one apple or any other fruit it gets stuck
customer_reviews.author: Mayer

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Masticating Juicer Machine, Slow and Quiet Action, Cold Pressed Fruits & Vegetables, BPA Free, Easy Clean (67951), 150 Watts, Silver
product_meta.description: Adding more fruits and vegetables to your diet is a great idea, and the Hamilton Beach Low Speed Juice Extractor can help keep you going strong, whether you’re adding juicing to your lifestyle or just love a fresh glass of juice to start your day. Having a juice extractor at home makes it easy to prepare delicious, wholesome juices using your favorite fruits and vegetables with no added ingredients or preservatives. And the low-speed, quiet motor is perfect for extracting all the goodness from vegetables, fruits, leafy greens, and wheatgrass. This juicer assembles very quickly with a few twists. When you are ready to juice, simply plug it in, set up the juice and pulp cups, turn it on, and begin adding fruit or vegetables to the chute. The slow juicer’s masticating action crushes and squeezes produce to extract the maximum amount of juice. Once your juice is ready to serve, a separator keeps the foam from pouring out with the juice. All the parts are dishwasher safe and cleaning up is easier than most juice extractors because the strainer rinses clean with running water. Follow a recipe from the included booklet, or create your own flavor combinations. Make fresh juice with minimal effort and easy cleanup. ..now that’s Good Thinking.
feature_bullets: Create fresh, cold-pressed juice at home: juice a variety of fruits and vegetables. Easy to assemble.
3-Year limited from the #1 selling juice Extractor brand*: includes access to us-based customer support.
Easy to clean: removable parts easily rinse clean. No scrubbing or scouring. Easier to clean than traditional juicers. Cleaning brush included.
Lower energy and less noise: just 150W of power creates a quiet, slow press.
Smoother results: masticating action creates smoother texture and less separation than the leading Centrifugal juicer. Extracts 2x more juice when juicing spinach.

Juice a variety of fruits and vegetables: from soft foods like spinach, kale, berries, grapes, and tomatoes to harder foods like apples, cucumbers, pears, carrots, oranges, celery, pineapple, ginger root and beets, this juicer processes a rainbow of colors and flavors.
*Source: the npd group/ Retail Tracking service, U. S. Unit sales, 12 months ending March 2019.
